title: Here's to Your health: std's
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Health. Health Promotion Unit, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Sexually transmitted diseases

description: This program sets out to raise the awareness of issues regarding sexually transmitted diseases. It emphasizes the presentation of correct information and examines the transmission of STD's and the prevention of all STD's.
